title: Looking for four 1910 Charlotte Old Mill T210 cards
author: BrettHoneycutt

posts.post_title: Looking for four 1910 Charlotte Old Mill T210 cards
posts.post_content:
Looking for just four (4) of the 1910 Charlotte Old Mill Cigarettes T210 cards. 

I have 11 of the 15 Charlotte Hornets cards and just need the following to complete the team set:

-- Cross
-- Dobard
-- Duvie
-- Humphrey

Will take in an condition. 

Any help is greatly appreciated.

Thank you,

Brett
Any chance you have any Greenville Spinners lying around?
I don't. I just collect Charlotte cards and memorabilia. Thank you for asking, though.

Brian helped me again, so now I'm just looking for three (3) of the 1910 Charlotte Old Mill Cigarettes T210 cards.

I have 12 of the 15 Charlotte Hornets cards and just need the following to complete the team set:

-- Cross
-- Duvie
-- Humphrey

Will take in any condition.

Any help is greatly appreciated.

Thank you,

Brett
